title: Ep 11: Shannon Keating
itunes:title: Ep 11: Shannon Keating
itunes:subtitle: We’re talking about INTENTIONAL SHOPPING today here at “Gee Thanks” with Shannon Keating, the senior culture writer and editor at BuzzFeed and also the author of the newsletter, You Have (Nearly) Everything You Need (subscribe! https://shannonkeating.s...
description:
We’re talking about INTENTIONAL SHOPPING today here at “Gee Thanks” with Shannon Keating, the senior culture writer and editor at BuzzFeed and also the author of the newsletter, You Have (Nearly) Everything You Need (subscribe! https://shannonkeating.substack.com/). 


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod


Shannon and Caroline go deep on shopping for clothes, their money habits (spending and saving!), Shannon’s Year Of Big Changes and...popcorn!


Mentioned On This Episode!

  • Old Navy Jeans: https://fave.co/39idVt9 
  • Madewell Jeans: https://fave.co/2SrZWKL 
  • Essential Oil Diffuser: https://amzn.to/2H0HyTV 
  • Digit Saving App (This link gets you $5!): https://digit.co/r/-yd50kkioQ?utm_source=&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=iosReferSignin&utm_term=referral 
  • Madewell Loafers: https://fave.co/37MlMzt 
  • Revlon One Step: https://amzn.to/399GpoU 
  • Popcorn Bowl: https://amzn.to/2UvHZgN 
  • Popcorn Flavors: https://amzn.to/2H36rOW 
  • Nutritional Yeast: https://amzn.to/2Spr2SM 
  • Caroline’s Fav NYC Burger: https://www.yelp.com/biz/reyes-deli-and-grocery-brooklyn 


The Time I Went On a Lesbian Cruise and it Blew Up My Entire Life by Shannon Keating

https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/shannonkeating/lesbian-cruise


Follow Shannon on Instagram: https://instagram.com/skeatings 

And on Twitter (especially ahead of the election!): https://twitter.com/skeatings 

Thanks for listening!


Check out blog posts and all of the recommended products by past guests, listeners and Caroline at www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 


Shop the spreadsheet (updated with new recs all of the time!): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vdIkPMWhV0FlRux3u_DVpuGvakQxkF3EbYT2ZVv45B8/edit#gid=0 and the Amazon store: https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit


Follow along with recs (and share your own...
